about_the_game:
The AI Roguelite soundtrack consists thus far of 15 ambient tracks, 6 combat tracks, and 1 main theme. All pieces were composed by Max Loh (myself).

The orchestral main theme was composed specifically for AI Roguelite. The other tracks were composed for various films, short films, or discontinued games/mods, and co-opted for AI Roguelite because they fit the mood and I own the full copyright.

If/when I compose more pieces for AI Roguelite, I will add them to this soundtrack.

name: AI Roguelite Main Theme (OST)
short_description: AI Roguelite soundtrack by Max Loh, including ambient and combat pieces, as well as the orchestral main menu theme.
